name: Space Tacos
description:
Familiar Game Jam #3 (#familiargamejam3) theme : Misanthropy

You play a Tacos deliver guys and you have to deliver your Tacos before the Timer end. The street on this planet are crowded, try to make your way,or create one...

Credits:

  • Aubry GRIEGER - GD/Graph (Twitter)
  • Antoine SEMBLAT - GD/Dev/Sound (mouth only) (Twitter / Patreon)

Link to the theme *SPOILERS*

The player kills instinctively those aliens beccause they just annoy him, then he discover that he is also an alien. So the player's misanthropy come from what he don't know and from his use as a gamer (Alien=Shoot !!!).

In fact If you let those aliens talk to you, your goal will be fulfilled faster.
